body_html: With the latest BFC allocator I think you mentioned this is no longer necessary. We want to keep convolutional.py pretty simple -- if this is required for even smaller GPUs, we might want to just mention that in the file and point to an external example. Thanks for looking into this and helping to verify the fix!

body: With the latest BFC allocator I think you mentioned this is no longer necessary.  We want to keep convolutional.py pretty simple -- if this is required for even smaller GPUs, we might want to just mention that in the file and point to an external example.  Thanks for looking into this and helping to verify the fix!
